entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then flurries or periods of freezing drizzle beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
